title: Psycho-emotional tendencies
description: How you relate to pace, meaning, ritual, presentation, and playfulness in everyday life.

questions.text: I often turn chores or routine tasks into little games or playful challenges.
questions.question_text: I often turn chores or routine tasks into little games or playful challenges.

questions.text: Curiosity detours delight me—even brief ones during ordinary days.
questions.question_text: Curiosity detours delight me—even brief ones during ordinary days.

questions.text: Packing small comforts and logistics feels like care, not overthinking.
questions.question_text: Packing small comforts and logistics feels like care, not overthinking.

questions.text: Presentation matters to me—symmetry, staging, and polish change the experience.
questions.question_text: Presentation matters to me—symmetry, staging, and polish change the experience.

questions.text: I can offer small, well-timed reflections that turn feelings into clarity.
questions.question_text: I can offer small, well-timed reflections that turn feelings into clarity.

questions.text: Micro-rituals (a phrase, scent, or breath) quickly shift my headspace.
questions.question_text: Micro-rituals (a phrase, scent, or breath) quickly shift my headspace.

questions.text: People relax when I set a calm, confident pace.
questions.question_text: People relax when I set a calm, confident pace.

questions.text: Which presentation details satisfy you most? (Choose any.)
questions.question_text: Which presentation details satisfy you most? (Choose any.)

questions.text: How do you like to begin shared activities?
questions.question_text: How do you like to begin shared activities?

choices.label: Clear plan with roles and exits named
Light sketch, then feel it out
Free-flow improv; decide as we go

questions.text: A one-sentence intention before we begin helps me stay honest and present.
questions.question_text: A one-sentence intention before we begin helps me stay honest and present.

questions.text: I appreciate a gentle debrief or check-in after intense moments.
questions.question_text: I appreciate a gentle debrief or check-in after intense moments.

questions.text: Which check-ins help you most? (Choose any.)
questions.question_text: Which check-ins help you most? (Choose any.)

questions.text: Playful mischief and pattern-breaking help me reconnect when energy dips.
questions.question_text: Playful mischief and pattern-breaking help me reconnect when energy dips.

questions.text: I feel safest when stop-signals and exits are explicit and close at hand.
questions.question_text: I feel safest when stop-signals and exits are explicit and close at hand.

questions.text: Which endings land best for you right now?
questions.question_text: Which endings land best for you right now?

questions.text: I can switch headspaces quickly when invited (e.g., playful ↔ focused).
questions.question_text: I can switch headspaces quickly when invited (e.g., playful ↔ focused).

questions.text: I prefer a gentle warm-up before intensity.
questions.question_text: I prefer a gentle warm-up before intensity.

questions.text: After a tough day, which reset helps you most?
questions.question_text: After a tough day, which reset helps you most?

choices.label: Acts of care (tea, snack, small task done for me)

questions.text: I like when ritual and meaning are present—but not heavy-handed.
questions.question_text: I like when ritual and meaning are present—but not heavy-handed.
